blogPost.title: What is the best financial advice for people at the age of 30 who wants to retire at the age of 50? Answer by Tiffany Aliche @TheBudgetnista. https://t.co/WckiqE1a84 https://t.co/zBMFWOYc7X
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 50歳で引退したいと考えている30歳の人にとって、最適な経済的アドバイスは何でしょうか？Answer by Tiffany Aliche @TheBudgetnista. https://t.co/WckiqE1a84 https://t.co/zBMFWOYc7X

next.title: Where should I start if I want to use AI for my business? Answer by @ashfontana, author of "The AI-First Company". https://t.co/d05de8bX7d https://t.co/1tHfWHjiKz

localize.full_text: AIをビジネスに活用したい場合、何から始めればいいのか？AIファーストの会社」の著者、@ashfontanaさんの回答です。https://t.co/d05de8bX7d https://t.co/1tHfWHjiKz
